body: cmd/dist creates stackGuardMultiplier based on whether the code is being built with -N.  The value is fixed in cmd/internal/obj when cmd/dist is run.  However, if you later wind up building a cross-compiler, then that cross-compiler should use a value of stackGuardMultiplier that corresponds to whether -N is being used to build a cross-compiler, not to the value used when the original toolchain was built.
